meanings.definition: The act of creating a mezzotint.
meanings.sent1: Mezzotinting requires skill and patience to achieve the desired effect.
meanings.sent2: She learned mezzotinting from a master artist in town.
meanings.sent3: The mezzotinting process felt like a magical journey into the world of art.
meanings.sent4: His mezzotinting was like sculpting shadows on paper.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of mezzotinting lies in its subtle gradations of light and dark.

meanings.definition: The process of producing a mezzotint image.
meanings.sent1: After hours of mezzotinting, the image finally emerged on the plate.
meanings.sent2: The mezzotinting of the portrait captured every detail with precision.
meanings.sent3: Watching the mezzotinting unfold was like witnessing a slow-motion painting.
meanings.sent4: Her mezzotinting was a dance of textures and tones.
meanings.sent5: The art of mezzotinting transforms a blank canvas into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The technique of mezzotinting a print.
meanings.sent1: Mastering the technique of mezzotinting requires dedication and practice.
meanings.sent2: The artist demonstrated the intricate steps of mezzotinting a print.
meanings.sent3: His mezzotinting technique was so smooth, it seemed effortless.
meanings.sent4: Mezzotinting a print is like painting with shadows and light.
meanings.sent5: The art world marvels at the precision of mezzotinting in printmaking.
